oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Silage feed advice for pig farmers: Farmers Weekly report on ICOPP feeding trial at FAI Farms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Clements, Ruth
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Feeding and growth
Health and welfare
Pigs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A trial is conducted at FAI Farms, as part of the Core Organic II ICOPP project, to assess the use of alternative sources of protein (peas and beans) as part of a lucerne-silage based ration for pigs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Clements, Ruth (2013) Silage feed advice for pig farmers: Farmers Weekly report on ICOPP feeding trial at FAI Farms. Farmers Weekly, 29 April 2013.
